extendedInfo.description: Tiny size, faster and easier to note!Most convenient note app for your choice!Support online backup by google sync cloud service!Add a small sticky note widget to your home (2x2, 4x4). Features:â  Support Folder, organize notes in foldersâ  Use color to categorize notesâ  Display note in several font sizeâ  Dispaly note in check list â  A lot of funny fontsâ  Customize text colorsâ  Sticky note widget (2x2, 4x4)â  Backup notes to sd storageâ  Supports online back up and sync with your google accountâ  Powerful reminder featureâ  Send note shortcut to desktopâ  Search notes by keywordsâ  Share notes via SMS, email, twitter etc.This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Simple yet effective. The perfect app for me for making lists. The ability to change fonts and colors on each note is very cool. However, found a bug, like the title of the note dissapears whenever I strikethrough an item on a checklist. Please fix it.
reviews.author: Dotie Roco

reviews.title: If you love pop up ads...download this!
reviews.comment: Would have gotten 4 stars if not for all the ads.  I\'ve never had an app do this before.  Notes feature is great...but the notes are secondary to the ads!
reviews.author: Donte Perry

reviews.title: Sorry
reviews.comment: Not happy with the new update. Keep getting ads pop up. Put it back the way it was and I might reinstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems Jams
reviews.comment: Program jams while typing.  Need to wait a few seconds for the keyboard to unfreeze.  A real hassle. Downloaded a new program.  Using Sony Erisson Xperia.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bloated
reviews.comment: Contains many push ads and icon installs. Only get if you\'re rooted with as blockers.

reviews.title: Was ok until updates
reviews.comment: Too many pop up of ads! Please put back the old version. Please...  I would pay a few dollars for a great app notes. Love the ideal you can change colors/fonts.

reviews.title: To many ads...
reviews.comment: It used to be a good note taking app, but since an update ads would pop up at various times while using this app. I have deleted this app and installed a better app without ads.

reviews.title: Contains ad ware, leaked phone number
reviews.comment: DON\'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP, unless you want annoying ads in your notification bar and your phone number leaked and spy ware on your phone. This app itself is ok sticky notes. But when I started getting ads in my notification bar, I downloaded an app to find the offending app. It was Tiny Notes. It also found that Tiny Notes was leaking my phone number and committing 2 other privacy violations. DON\'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AD ALERT!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Do not get this app. Causes ads to show up in your notification bar and screen turns on and off when on lock. This crap should be illegal!!!!

reviews.comment: Spam like crazy. Lagged up my phone so much. Delete ASAP.
